verses.verse: Now after <WH310> Abimelech <WH40> died, Tola <WH8439> the son <WH1121> of Puah, <WH6312> the son <WH1121> of Dodo, <WH1734> a man <WH376> of Issachar, <WH3485> arose <WH6965> to save <WH3467> Israel; <WH3478> and he lived <WH3427> in Shamir <WH8069> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Ephraim. <WH669>
And he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> twenty-three years. <WH8141> Then he died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in Shamir. <WH8069>
And after <WH310> him, Jair <WH2971> the Gileadite <WH1569> arose, <WH6965> and judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> twenty-two years. <WH8141>

And he had <WH1961> thirty <WH7970> sons <WH1121> who rode <WH7392> on thirty <WH7970> donkeys, <WH5895> and they had thirty <WH7970> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> that are called <WH7121> Havvoth-jair to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
And Jair <WH2971> died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in Kamon. <WH7056>

Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> again <WH3254> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord, <WH3068> served <WH5647> the Baals <WH1168> and the Ashtaroth, <WH9441> the gods <WH430> of Aram, <WH758> the gods <WH430> of Sidon, <WH6721> the gods <WH430> of Moab, <WH4124> the gods <WH430> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and the gods <WH430> of the Philistines; <WH6430> thus they forsook <WH5800> the Lord <WH3068> and did not serve <WH5647> Him.

And the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> burned <WH2734> against Israel, <WH3478> and He sold <WH4376> them into the hands <WH3027> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and into the hands <WH3027> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>

And they afflicted <WH7492> and crushed <WH7533> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> that year; <WH8141> for eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> years <WH8141> they [afflicted] all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> who <WH834> were beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> in Gilead <WH1568> in the land <WH776> of the Amorites. <WH567>

And the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> crossed <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to fight <WH3898> also <WH1571> against Judah, <WH3063> Benjamin, <WH1144> and the house <WH1004> of Ephraim, <WH669> so that Israel <WH3478> was greatly <WH3966> distressed. <WH9503>

Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH2199> out to the Lord, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> "We have sinned <WH2398> against Thee, for indeed, we have forsaken <WH5800> our God <WH430> and served <WH5647> the Baals. <WH1168>"

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "[Did I] not [deliver you] from the Egyptians, <WH4714> the Amorites, <WH567> the sons <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and the Philistines <WH6430>?
"Also when the Sidonians, <WH6722> the Amalekites <WH6002> and the Maonites <WH4584> oppressed <WH3905> you, you cried <WH6817> out to Me, and I delivered <WH3467> you from their hands. <WH3027>
"Yet you have forsaken <WH5800> Me and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods; <WH430> therefore <WH3651> I will deliver <WH3467> you no <WH3808> more. <WH3254>
"Go <WH1980> and cry <WH2199> out to the gods <WH430> which <WH834> you have chosen; <WH977> let them deliver <WH3467> you in the time <WH6256> of your distress. <WH6869>"

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to the Lord, <WH3068> "We have sinned, <WH2398> do <WH6213> to us whatever <WH3605> seems good <WH2896> to Thee; only <WH389> please <WH4994> deliver <WH5337> us this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>"

So they put <WH5493> away <WH5493> the foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430> from among <WH7130> them, and served <WH5647> the Lord; <WH3068> and He could <WH9527> bear <WH9527> the misery <WH5999> of Israel <WH3478> no <WH9527> longer. <WH9527>

Then the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were summoned, <WH6817> and they camped <WH2583> in Gilead. <WH1568> And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gathered <WH622> together, and camped <WH2583> in Mizpah. <WH4709>

And the people, <WH5971> the leaders <WH8269> of Gilead, <WH1568> said <WH559> to one <WH376> another, <WH7453> "Who <WH4310> is the man <WH376> who <WH834> will begin <WH2490> to fight <WH3898> against the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>? He shall become <WH1961> head <WH7218> over all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gilead. <WH1568>"
